mapper.select: select stu_no as stuNo,stu_age as stuAge,stu_name as stuName,grade_name as gradeName from student where stu_no = #{stuNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (stu_no, stu_name, stu_age, grade_name, app_id, obj_type, obj_id, uid) VALUES (#{stuNo}, #{stuName}, #{stuAge}, #{gradeName}, #{appId}, #{objType}, #{obj_id}, #{uid});
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET app_id=#{appId} WHERE stu_no=#{stuNo}
UPDATE student SET state=#{state} WHERE stu_no=#{stuNo}
UPDATE student SET add_date=#{date} WHERE stu_no=#{stuNo}
